author: jacopoc
msg: Applied fix from trunk for revision: 1530876

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-534: Support use of the WHEN clause in CREATE TRIGGER statements
Reuse code for dependency checking of the triggered SQL statement for
checking dependencies in the WHEN clause.
Add test to verify that attempts to drop columns referenced in the WHEN
clause detect that the trigger is dependent on the columns.

msg: The link under Tomcat Context Descriptor section should point to documentation about context.xml and not the one for server.xml. Issue is reported via o.a.comments.
